# Gauntlet of Rust
## Overview
**Aura** moderate transmutation; **CL** 7th

**Slot** hands

**Price** 11,500 gp

**Weight** 2 lbs.

**Description**

This single metal gauntlet looks rusted and pitted but is actually quite powerful. Once per day, it can affect an object as with the *[[Rusting Grasp (Spell)|rusting grasp]]* spell. It also completely protects the wearer and her gear from rust (magical or otherwise), including the attack of a rust monster.

**Construction**

**Requirements** [[Craft Wondrous Item (Feat)|Craft Wondrous Item]], *[[Rusting Grasp (Spell)|rusting grasp]]*

**Cost** 5,750 gp

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 514
